attributes.additional_details: Given that time is running out and the interim between the granting of the extension and the new deadline has not been spent wisely by the Government, Article 50 should be revoked and a public debate started as to the options for what kind of Brexit is required (as should have been done 3 years ago) followed by a referendum as to which is the preferred option to work towards.
attributes.background: The increasing possibility of a potentially damaging "No Deal" exit from the EU make it necessary to consider all options to avoid this.
